resources.string: Fetching some info, hang in there‚Ä¶
Hold your horses! You\'re doing that too often in a short amount of time.
Find your community, connect with the world.
Revolt is one of the best ways to stay connected with your friends and community, anywhere, anytime.
We are currently experiencing issues with our services. Please check our status page for more information.
There was a problem logging you in
You might have logged out from another device, or your internet connection might be down.
Enter your email and we\'ll send you instructions on how to reset your password.
Use Revolt to chat about stuff.
It\'s like a place to hang out, get together, and talk about stuff. Best part, it\'s on the internet.
Your data is safe with us. We don\'t sell it, and neither do we use it to show you ads.
We\'ll send you a verification email to confirm your account.
Eight or more, common ones are bad. Symbols and numbers recommended.
Verify your email, and then we\'ll get on with choosing your username.
It\'s time to choose a username!
Others will find, recognise and mention you with this name.
But if you change your mind, you can change your username at any time in your User Settings.
You have been logged out. Please log in again.
You\'ve got 2FA enabled to keep your account extra-safe.
Enter the six-digit code from your authenticator app.
Enter one of your recovery codes.
Brought to you with ‚ù§Ô∏è by the Revolt team.
Revolt is built with the help of these awesome open-source projects.
We\'re grateful to the developers of these projects for making their work available to the world.
The list below is automatically generated. It may be incomplete or inaccurate.
Sorry, this feature is not ready yet.
You can only reply to %1$d messages at a time.
This attachment will only be revealed when tapped.
Jenvolt is the developer-run space for all things Android app and more. Support, feedback go here. Maybe you will get to try out new features! üëÄ
Change your look, manage your account, and more
Take a look at your user card and get a special link to share
Revolt never sleeps, take a look to see what\'s been in the works
Got something to say? We\'re all ears
An error occurred while sharing your user card.
This is not a valid Revolt QR code.
You need to grant the camera permission to scan QR codes.
You can add friends by their %1$susername%3$s and %2$stag%3$s. For example, if their username is %1$sjane%3$s and their tag is %2$s1234%3$s, you can add them with %1$sjane%3$s#%2$s1234%3$s.
The clipboard does not contain a valid username and tag.
Round up your crew in a group chat. You can add up to %1$d people.
There aren\'t any channels in this server. Not even a welcome channel. How rude.
You\'re not in a channel right now.
Select a server from the left to get started. If you\'re feeling adventurous, you can create a new server.
This channel is marked as NSFW
You must be 18 or older to view this channel.
You must be 18 or older to view this channel.
You can\'t be born in the future.
This is the start of your conversation
There may be some messages missing here.
You can\'t send messages in this channel.
You don\'t have permission to send messages in this channel.
This is a trusted channel for notices from our moderation team. You can\'t send messages here.
Failed to send, long press for options
Tap to play video from YouTube
You will not receive any notifications for messages, but you will receive notifications for @mentions.
You will not receive any notifications, including messages and @mentions.
You will be able to use Revolt as usual, but you will not appear as online to other people.
Your status text will be visible to everyone. Keep it short and sweet.
Tell the world what you\'re up to
Status text is too long. Try to keep it under %1$d characters.
An error occurred while updating your status text. Please try again later.
You are not connected to the internet. Please check your connection and try again.
This channel may have been deleted or you may not have permission to view it.
A default emoji that you can use anywhere
There hasn\'t been a description set for this channel yet.
Send this link to invite people to this channel.
Message is empty, nothing to copy
Are you sure you want to delete this message?
It will be gone forever (a long time!)
There hasn\'t been a description set for this server yet.
Until you get invited back, you won\'t be able to rejoin.
We\'re still working on bringing server management to our Android app. Please use the web app to manage your server for now.
This user may have been deleted or you may not have permission to view them.
Webhooks are automated broadcasts from other services on the internet. They can\'t chat back, but you can still see what they have to say.
This user hasn\'t set a bio yet.
This user\'s bio could not be fetched. Please verify you share a server or are friends.
Could not open DM with this user.
This is a bot. It has a plan.
A server is where the magic happens. Chat with your friends, share memes, build communities, and more.
Join by invite code or link
You already have an invite code to join an existing server.
You want to create a completely new server from scratch.
If you have an invite code or link, you can join a server right now.
You can always customise the name or icon and invite your friends later.
Server name can be up to %1$d characters in length.
An error occurred while creating your server. Please try again later.
Join by invite code or link
Enter a link like rvlt.gg/Testers or an invite code like Testers
This feature is currently under construction.
Tell us what\'s wrong with this message
Thank you for taking the time to report this message. Your report will not be shared with the user who sent the message or the server\'s moderators.
Note: This message may have been sent from another platform. It is recommended to also report the message on the platform it was sent from.
Tell us what\'s wrong with this server
Thank you for taking the time to report this server. Your report will not be shared with the server\'s moderators.
Tell us what\'s wrong with this user
Thank you for taking the time to report this user. Your report will not be shared with the user or the server\'s moderators.
Extreme violence, gore or animal cruelty
Not of minimum age to use the platform
Any additional information that may help us in our investigation. Optional.
Thank you for helping to keep Revolt safe. We will review your report as soon as possible.
An error occurred while submitting your report. Please try again later.
Would you like to block this user?
No app found to handle this link
You\'ve been invited to join this server. Would you like to join?
You are already a member of this server.
Could not find an invite with the specified code.
You are banned from this server.
Camera permission is required to take photos
To join a voice channel, you need to grant the following permissions:
Your microphone, so others can hear you when unmuted
Your camera, so others can see you if you want to share video
Don\'t worry, we won\'t use your microphone or camera without your permission.
Voice channels are not available at the moment.
All voice nodes are unavailable at the moment. Please try again later.
An error occurred. Please try again later.
Enable notifications to be kept up to date with messages and mentions. Note you will have to enable background services in notification settings for this to work fully.
Revolt has keyboard shortcuts! Press %1$s to see them.
You\'re one of the first to try out our new Android app. We\'re excited to have you here!

Since this is early access, things might not be perfect just yet. You might run into the occasional bug, crash, or weird quirk. Your feedback helps us smooth out the rough edges and make Revolt even better.
We\'re thrilled to have you on board. Let\'s make something great together!
Making message threads has never been easier.\nJust swipe to the left on any message.\nReply up to five messages at once.
If you have any feedback, suggestions, or bug reports, please let us know. We\'re always looking to improve Revolt.
You have received an important notice regarding your account from our moderation team. Please read it carefully.
The session of this device is unavailable. Please **log in again** to view your current session.
This device will stay logged in.
Material You is not supported on this device.
Choose the rounding grade for profile pictures, including in chat and profiles. This applies to all users.
This file is not a valid colour override file.
You can reply from any message\'s menu.
Interactive Embeds allow you to interact with some types of links directly inside chat. For example, you can play YouTube videos or preview albums from Apple Music.
Some of your Revolt settings are corrupted. This may be due to the use of third-party clients. The affected settings are:
Get notified instantly about new messages from your friends and servers.
Receive notifications instantly when the app is closed. Uses more battery but ensures you never miss a message.
Notifications are disabled. Please enable them in your device settings to receive message notifications.
Disable battery optimization to ensure reliable background notifications. May impact battery life.
Battery optimization enabled - notifications may be delayed
Battery optimization disabled - notifications will arrive reliably
Find and disable battery optimization for Revolt
Please find battery settings in app info
Unable to open settings. Please manually disable battery optimization for Revolt.
Battery optimization not available on this Android version
Until I turn it back on
Join the Revolt Forked server to give feedback or suggestions and report bugs.
There was an error updating the channel.
This channel is exclusively for conversation about‚Ä¶
Users are asked to confirm their age before joining NSFW channels.
Users will be asked to confirm their age before joining this channel.
Users will no longer be asked to confirm their age before joining this channel. Please ensure the content is appropriate for all ages.
Are you sure you want to delete this channel?
All messages and settings for this channel will be gone forever (a long time!)
Please log in before sharing to Revolt.
This is not a valid share intent.
This attachment is too large for Revolt (max. %1$s).
Select a channel to share to.
Incoming friend requests, as well as accepted requests you\'ve sent.
Toggle on to automatically check for new releases
Revolt may block content in certain jurisdictions in response to legislation or legal notices
This channel is not available in your region while we review options on legal compliance.
